turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'm really hungry for lunch and I want to place a pickup order for pizzas from Bella Luna. Can you help?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get two small pizzas. One with pepperoni and the other with onions, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, you are ordering 2 small pizzas, 1 with pepperoni, 1 with onions, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, both need to be with gluten-free crust, though. I forgot to mention.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem, i can add that. your total will be $28, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's great. How long till it's ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
